if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431))

if(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431)

item.title: Safe zones error

client.java:859: ')' expected
        if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431)

Press any key to continue . . .

        viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1);
        viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1);
